title: Scooby-Doo and Scrappy-Doo
overview: Scooby-Doo and Scrappy-Doo, also known as The All-New Scooby-Doo and Scrappy-Doo is the fourth incarnation of Hanna-Barbera's Scooby-Doo Saturday morning cartoons. It premiered on ABC on September 22, 1979, featuring a new member to the gang: Scooby's pint-sized, feisty nephew, Scrappy. This show was one of the few that contained Fred, Daphne, and Velma, with Scrappy.
